DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the pharmacokinetics and safety of Singulair (10 mg) and Xyzal (5 mg) in free combination and fixed-dose combination as HCP1102
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Pharmacokinetics and Safety of Singulair and Xyzal in Free Combination and Fixed-dose Combination
DOC.criteria: Healthy male Age between 20 and 55 Signed informed consent Has a history of hypersensitivity to IP ingredients Hypotension or hypertension Has a history of acute infection within 14 days of screening
